mapper.insert: insert into tb_award(award_name, award_desc, award_img, point, shop_id, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status) values(#{awardName},#{awardDesc},#{awardImg},#{point},#{shopId},#{priority}, #{createTime},#{lastEditTime},#{enableStatus});
mapper.delete: delete from tb_award where award_id = #{awardId} and shop_id = ${shopId};
mapper.select:
select count(1) from tb_award
and award_name like '%${awardCondition.awardName}%' and award_name like '%${awardCondition.awardDesc}%' and shop_id = #{awardCondition.shopId}, and enable_status = ${awardCondition.enableStatus}
